name: regex-common
description: Introducing regex-common, the go-to npm package for all your regular expression needs. Simplify your development workflow with pre-built, tested, and highly customizable regex patterns. Say goodbye to regex headaches and hello to cleaner, more efficient code.
author: Robson Melo de Souza <sys.robson@gmail.com> (https://robson-melo-dev.github.io/new-portfolio/)
